mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.plugin.visibility

Class FieldLevelVisibilityHandler<T,CommonIndexValue>

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.vector.plugin.visibility.FieldLevelVisibilityHandler<T,CommonIndexValue>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    CommonIndexValue -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FieldVisibilityHandler<T,CommonIndexValue>

    public class FieldLevelVisibilityHandler<T,CommonIndexValue>
extends Object
implements FieldVisibilityHandler<T,CommonIndexValue>
    Define visibility for a specific attribute using the VisibilityManagement. The visibility is determined by meta-data in a separate feature attribute.
    See Also:
    JsonDefinitionColumnVisibilityManagement

        Used when acting with an Index adaptor as a visibility handler. This
        Parameters:
        fieldName - - the name of the field for which to set determine the visibility.
        fieldVisiblityHandler - default visibility handler if a specific visibility cannot be determined from the contents of the attribute used to determine visibility (name providied by parameter 'visibilityAttribute')
        visibilityAttribute - the attribute name that contains data to discern visibility for other field/attributes.
        visibilityManagement -
